thread.title: Horror for Leanne as Simon goes missing in Corrie | Metro News
thread.title_full: Horror for Leanne as Simon goes missing in Corrie | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Horror for Leanne as Simon goes missing in Corrie | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:58 pm (Picture: ITV) 
Leanne Tilsley is on edge in Coronation Street as Simon Barlow goes missing – and she immediately blames Peter and Toyah for being irresponsible. When Peter is looking after Simon, he drops him off at a party in town but he is then left in a panic when he loses touch with his son. 
Earlier in the week, Simon is caught in the feud between Leanne and her sisters and he advises both Toyah and Eva to give her space and stop harassing her with texts. But when the messages stop coming through, Leanne is secretly disappointed. (Picture: ITV) 
This potential thawing is undone though when Leanne gets wind that Simon has been dropped off in town and is not answering his phone. 
As a search gets underway for Simon, Leanne rails at Peter and Toyah for being so careless and she harshly lashes out by telling Toyah that she could never understand as she’s not a mum. (Picture: ITV) 
Will Simon be found safe – and will the tension around his disappearance cause Leanne and Toyah’s relationship to crumble even further? 
One to watch: Friday 17th February on ITV at 8:30pm.
